name: Team Up Dungeon
description:
The call to adventure! Recruit your best talent and raid the dungeons!

  • Idea based on strategic board game
  • Easy to learn yet hard to master
  • More than 40 unique characters
  • 20 levels to challenge yourself for the moment
  • Team formation for maximum performance 

More coming soon:

  • More characters and dungeons
  • More different types of encounter 
  • Illustration Update

Note:

  • You may need to enable WebGL and hardware acceleration to run this game. 
  • The game is still in development,  please feel free to share your thoughts on it!
  • Stay Safe.
